intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What is your favorite restaurant food?
What is your favorite outdoor activity?
What is your favorite type of dessert?
Where do you go to school?

respond_situations.description: You are in a shop. You want to buy something.

respond_situations.starter_line: What would you like to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. Choose a drink.

respond_situations.starter_line: How many books do you have?
respond_situations.description: You are in class. Count your books.

ask_situations.instruction: You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper where the bread is.
You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You are with your friend. You want help with your bag. ..

listening_script.text: I call my friend. We talk on the phone. I say hello. We chat about our day. I ask about his family.

follow_up_questions.question: Why do you like this vegetable?
Where can you buy this vegetable?
